description: Ninefs is a 9p filesystem for win32. It is built on the Dokan and npfs libraries. It allows 9p resources from other machines to be mounted as a filesystem in a win32 system such as Windows XP. See http://ninefs.googlecode.com/files/README.txt for more information.
summary: 9p filesystem for win32 using the Dokan library
author: tim.newsham
